message: Amazing Tiki Bar in Alameda Forbidden Island http://www.forbiddenislandalameda.com/
Tonga Room is a good place. If your in SF you must hit the Smuggler's Cove! http://smugglerscovesf.com
Yeah I haven't made it out there yet, but have heard great things. Will definitely have to check it out.
@ericflo any Tiki Bars near where you live?
